Summary: Bright white ight 1/4 size of move stationary 2 minutes then three red lights appeared in triangular formation rotated 2.5 times then vanished
trends: There have been 15 other sightings in Fairfield
There were no other sightings in Fairfield on or around November 16th 2011
divs: Sighting DetailsEntered my upstairs bedroom to go to sleep and a bright light was in my eyes.Thinking it was the moon I went to the window to close blinds and observed it was not the moon but an object in the sky and smaller than the moon but much larger than a helicopter search light. So bright it illuminated by room like a full moon. After stationery 2 minutes three red lights appeared in triangular formation and object appeared to rotate 2.5 times to the north with plane of triangle perpendicular to the ground. After rotating it suddenly vanished. Clear night no clouds. I was so astonished. It was real not an effect or something ambiguous. Very tangible. Very clear cut. I was stunned that I was actually witnessing this thing.
